titles.title: Electing Minority Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

bill.summary: 3/11/2008--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Elects Minority Members to the House Committees on Armed Services and on Homeland Security.
